description:
Proven Attorneys In Springfield, Pennsylvania

Ciccarelli Law Offices has convenient locations throughout Pennsylvania, where our lawyers offer clients the dedicated legal counsel they need and deserve in personal injury claims, criminal defense cases, divorce proceedings and more. 

Whether you need a lawyer for a personal, business or family concern, contact us today to learn how we can help. Call 717-925-8654 to schedule a free consultation with a member of our team today.

A Long History Of Protecting Our Clients

Our law firm was founded in 1999 by Lee A. Ciccarelli, an experienced and accomplished attorney. Originally, Ciccarelli Law Offices offered aggressive personal injury and criminal defense counsel, but we have expanded to represent clients in a variety of family law, estate planning and civil litigation matters, too.

In all areas of law we practice, we provide dedicated legal representation focused on our clients' needs. We have a blue collar work ethic — working hard and working well to get things done right. We are honest with our clients, helping them understand their options and make the right decisions every step of the way throughout their cases. When you need a reputable attorney to help you with your legal concerns, you can trust our track record and our reputation.
